mapper.select: SELECT items.id, items.category, items.item, items.registration_date, items.deleted_date, stocks.id, stocks.items_id, stocks.quantity FROM items LEFT JOIN stocks ON items.id = stocks.items_id LEFT JOIN orders ON stocks.id = orders.stocks_id
